text.autoconfig.manhunt.option.compassBe: Sets the behavior of the compass mechanic, can be either UPDATE or USE.
UPDATE = Automatically update the compass every tick
USE = Use the compass to update it (like Dream's manhunt).
text.autoconfig.manhunt.option.damageBeh: Sets the behavior of the damage mechanic, can be either KILL or DAMAGE.
KILL = The speedrunner loses when they are killed (like Dream's manhunt).
DAMAGE = The speedrunner loses when they take damage (like dream's assassin).
text.autoconfig.manhunt.option.disabledD: Dimensions the compass won't work in.
text.autoconfig.manhunt.option.highlight: Weather to apply the glowing effect to the speedrunner, similar to Dream's Survivalist
text.autoconfig.manhunt.title: Manhunt Fabric Configuration
text.autoconfig.manhunt.option.giveCompa: Force hunters to have a compass
Gives a compass to hunters while being added and forces it upon them.
text.manhunt.command.speedrunner.error.h: Cannot set speedrunner to %s because they are a hunter!
text.manhunt.command.hunters.error.speed: Cannot add %s as a hunter because they are the speedrunner!
text.manhunt.command.hunters.error.hunte: Cannot add %s as a hunter because they are already a hunter!
